title: VIP Threshold Boundary Bug
description: Off-by-one error in VIP discount threshold check
bug_description: The calculate_discount() function uses strict inequality (>) instead of (>=) when checking if a customer qualifies for VIP status. This causes customers with exactly 100 loyalty points to miss their 20% VIP discount, receiving only the 5% regular discount instead.
test_hint: Test with customer having exactly LOYALTY_THRESHOLD (100) points. The buggy code will give 5% discount instead of 20%.
